98148818-e86f-426d-af56-07705f2d8ab6.name: Flashbacks (to inherited memories)
98148818-e86f-426d-af56-07705f2d8ab6.notes: In any situation that the GM feels is stressful, he will roll 3d. On a 6 or less, you have a flashback. The GM will roll whenever you miss a Fright Check or make the roll exactly, and whenever you fail a self-control roll for another stress-related disadvantage.

449fc985-d1c5-49fe-97a7-15eff46852fc.name: Mild
449fc985-d1c5-49fe-97a7-15eff46852fc.notes: Duration: 2d seconds; -2 on all skill rolls

b4d6f275-6326-482d-b704-8c2524de67e6.name: Severe
b4d6f275-6326-482d-b704-8c2524de67e6.notes: Duration: 1d minutes; -5 on all skill rolls

a6965fc1-fc62-4ad3-b84c-a264d868b7f7.name: Crippling
a6965fc1-fc62-4ad3-b84c-a264d868b7f7.notes: Duration: 3d minutes; Precludes all skill use
